Package fr.istic.aco.editor

Class Invoker

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.Invoker
public class Invoker extends Object
The Invoker class manages the execution of commands, designed for the Command design pattern. It holds the current text and selection indices, and maintains a map of command identifiers to their corresponding Command objects.
